## Description {#details}

Provides implementations for PassManager and AnalysisManager template methods.

These classes should be explicitly instantiated for any IR unit, and files doing the explicit instantiation should include this header.

<SectionDefinition>

## Variables

### UseNewDbgInfoFormat {#a926189935285d6e5df83fc0f45bf9b36}

</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Invalidation was handled after each pass in the above loop for the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// current unit of IR. Therefore, the remaining analysis results in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// AnalysisManager are preserved. We mark this with a set so that we don&#39;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IRUnitT, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">... ExtraArgTs&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysismanager/#a64b2a209a16bcd41375b5cae12690eaa"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysismanager/#a64b2a209a16bcd41375b5cae12690eaa">AnalysisManager&lt;IRUnitT, ExtraArgTs...&gt;::invalidate</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">    IRUnitT &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses">PreservedAnalyses</a> &amp;PA) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We&#39;re done if all analyses on this IR unit are preserved.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PA.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/#a2de5aab2964e0b9266423d5f6c375051">allAnalysesInSetPreserved</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/allanalyseson">AllAnalysesOn&lt;IRUnitT&gt;</a>&gt;())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Track whether each analysis&#39;s result is invalidated in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// IsResultInvalidated.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smalldensemap">SmallDenseMap&lt;AnalysisKey &#42;, bool, 8&gt;</a> IsResultInvalidated;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysismanager/invalidator">Invalidator</a> Inv(IsResultInvalidated, AnalysisResults);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">  AnalysisResultListT &amp;ResultsList = AnalysisResultLists&#91;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;AnalysisResultPair : ResultsList) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is basically the same thing as Invalidator::invalidate, but we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// can&#39;t call it here because we&#39;re operating on the type-erased result.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Moreover if we instead called invalidate() directly, it would do an</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// unnecessary look up in ResultsList.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/analysiskey">AnalysisKey</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> = AnalysisResultPair.first;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Result = &#42;AnalysisResultPair.second;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IMapI = IsResultInvalidated.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a0c047f127ed4380a6f383d70bec4eb94">find</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IMapI != IsResultInvalidated.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a65520b9c67759099e313d0f4e7b5ff9e">end</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This result was already handled via the Invalidator.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try to invalidate the result, giving it the Invalidator so it can</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// recursively query for any dependencies it has and record the result.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note that we cannot reuse &#39;IMapI&#39; here or pre-insert the ID, as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Result.invalidate may insert things into the map, invalidating our</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// iterator.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Inserted =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal">        IsResultInvalidated.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#adb33f3ede2f5bfc9b3ee658aaf648492">insert</a>(&#123;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>, Result.invalidate(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>, PA, Inv)&#125;).second;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal">    (void)Inserted;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Inserted &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Should never have already inserted this ID, likely &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal">                       </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;indicates a cycle!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now erase the results that were marked above as invalidated.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!IsResultInvalidated.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a49c487a9395a6c384be8544cfb2cfccf">empty</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/analysiskey">AnalysisKey</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;first;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal">        ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
